author: bridge-bot
content: <Souptacular> For those who aren't in the Eth R&D Discord here is a link - https://discord.gg/mynTVZC9nQ. It's public, but to keep it spam free and prevent bots from grabbing the link and joining to scam people, the link isn't shared super publicly. Anyone interested in Ethereum R&D topics are welcome. (re @NicolasCsgy: The interop channel on the R&D discord would be the best place)
